head.title: World Briefing | Africa: Somalia: Parliament Elects A New Speaker

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Africa: Somalia: Parliament Elects A New Speaker

abstract.p: Somalian lawmakers choose former Koranic teacher, Sheik Adan Mohammed Nur, as new speaker of Parliament, third highest political position in country after president and prime minister (S)

block.p: Lawmakers chose a former Koranic teacher, Sheik Adan Mohammed Nur, as the new speaker of Parliament, the third highest political position in the country after the president and prime minister. The previous speaker was ousted last month after he tried to broker a peace treaty between the transitional government and the Islamist movement that used to control Mogadishu. Meanwhile, American officials announced that for the first time since 1994 they were resuming Voice of America radio broadcasts into Somalia.
